title: War of the Roses: The Cousin Betrayal
description: Megan found out that her husband, Brandon, told his cousin that he liked someone at work and that he was having thoughts of cheating.  Brandon's cousin told Megan and now she's wondering if he actually is cheating or planning on it.
itunes:summary: Megan found out that her husband, Brandon, told his cousin that he liked someone at work and that he was having thoughts of cheating.  Brandon's cousin told Megan and now she's wondering if he actually is cheating or planning on it.
